rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0001
rows.name: Wait, what?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0002
rows.name:
This damage isn't from our last battle.
It's from earlier—when we crashed on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0003
rows.name:
It does look pretty bad in there, doesn't it?
You'd never know it by looking at the exterior. [ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0004
rows.name: All right, I'm entering the database chamber.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0005
rows.name:
Mm. Be extra careful in there.
That's everything we've been working for.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0006
rows.name: Understood.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0007
rows.name: Wh-what?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0008
rows.name: What is it, Elma? Is there a problem with the database?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0009
rows.name: No... That's impossible...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0010
rows.name: Elma, report.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0011
rows.name: Elma![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0012
rows.name: Secretary...I'll stick to the facts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0013
rows.name:
The system—everyone's consciousnesses and memories,
the entire database...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0014
rows.name: has been destroyed for some time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0015
rows.name: Destroyed?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0016
rows.name: What do you mean? Explain yourself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0017
rows.name:
The entire chamber is flooded. It's trashed.
The system is completely shut down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0018
rows.name:
And not just recently...
It's been this way since we got to Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0019
rows.name: That's absurd![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0020
rows.name:
Then how are we...
How in the world would anyone be...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0021
rows.name: I know. So then why...would you be alive?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0022
rows.name:
It's not possible...
Without the database...all your identities should be gone, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG0023
rows.name: It's this planet. It's something about this planet...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG9000
rows.name: —Lifehold Database Chamber—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12180100_MSG9001
rows.name: This story never truly ends...
